article.title: Constantine
article.paragraph: Constantinemost commonly refers to one of the following:

list.listitem: Constantine (name), a given name and surname

article.paragraph: It may also refer to:TOC right
article.heading: People

Constantine II (orKuestantinos II) of Ethiopia, also known asEskender

article.heading: Other

list.listitem: John Constantine, a fictional character appearing in DC Comics includingHellblazer.Constantine (comics)''Constantine'' (comics), a comic book series replacing the earlierHellblazer.Constantine (film)''Constantine'' (film), a 2005 American film loosely based on the comic bookHellblazer.Constantine (video game)''Constantine'' (video game), an action-adventure video game based on the film.Constantine (TV series)''Constantine'' (TV series), a 2014NBCTV series, based on the comic bookHellblazer.
Constantine, a frog character who bears resemblance toKermit the Frogand is the number one criminal in the 2014 filmMuppets Most Wanted.
